unnormalised: Entertainment Alert: Guess Who's Getting Hitched?!

unnormalised: Bollywood is buzzing! Rumor has it, the ever-so-stylish Alia Kapoor and cricket heartthrob Virat Rana are reportedly planning a destination wedding! Sources close to the families are whispering about Rajasthan - think Udaipur, maybe?
normalised: Bollywood is buzzing! Rumor has it, the ever-so-stylish Alia Kapoor and cricket heartthrob Virat Rana are reportedly planning a destination wedding! Sources close to the families are whispering about Rajasthan - think Udaipur, maybe?

unnormalised: The whispers started after Alia was spotted leaving designer Manish Malhotra's studio on 26/07/2024 looking suspiciously radiant. And then Virat was seen boarding a private jet from Mumbai around 14:00 hrs on 27/07/2024, destination unknown! Coincidence? We think not!

And then Virat was seen boarding a private jet from Mumbai around two P M on twenty seventh july two thousand and twenty four, destination unknown! Coincidence? We think not!

unnormalised: Of course, neither star has confirmed anything. But social media is going wild! Fans are already speculating about the guest list – Karan Johar is a definite, right? And will they have a sangeet with a Bollywood theme? We're dying to know!
